00037 #include "egs_collimated_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_CollimatedSource::EGS_CollimatedSource(EGS_Input *input,
00041     EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f),
00042     source_shape(0), target_shape(0), dist(1), ctry(0) {
00043     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("source shape");
00044     if( ishape ) {
00045         source_shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00046     }
00047     if( !source_shape ) {
00048         string sname; int err = input->getInput("source shape name",sname);
00049         if( err )
00050             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: missing/wrong inline source "
00051               "shape definition and missing wrong 'source shape name' input\n");
00052         else {
00053             source_shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00054             if( !source_shape )
00055                 egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: a shape named %s"
00056                     " does not exist\n",sname.c_str());
00057         }
00058     }
00059     ishape = input->takeInputItem("target shape");
00060     if( ishape ) {
00061         target_shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00062     }
00063     if( !target_shape ) {
00064         string sname; int err = input->getInput("target shape name",sname);
00065         if( err )
00066             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: missing/wrong inline target"
00067               "shape definition and missing wrong 'target shape name' input\n");
00068         else {
00069             target_shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00070             if( !source_shape )
00071                 egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: a shape named %s"
00072                     " does not exist\n",sname.c_str());
00073         }
00074     }
00075     if( target_shape ) {
00076         if( !target_shape->supportsDirectionMethod() )
00077             egsWarning("EGS_CollimatedSource: the target shape %s, which is"
00078                 " of type %s, does not support the getPointSourceDirection()"
00079                 " method\n",target_shape->getObjectName().c_str(),
00080                 target_shape->getObjectType().c_str());
00081     };
00082     EGS_Float auxd; int errd = input->getInput("distance",auxd);
00083     if( !errd ) dist = auxd;
00084     setUp();
00085 }
00086 
00087 void EGS_CollimatedSource::setUp() {
00088     otype = "EGS_CollimatedSource";
00089     if( !isValid() ) description = "Invalid collimated source";
00090     else {
00091         description = "Collimated source from a shape of type ";
00092         description += source_shape->getObjectType();
00093         description += " onto a shape of type ";
00094         description += target_shape->getObjectType();
00095         description += " with ";
00096         description += s->getType();
00097         if( q == -1 ) description += ", electrons";
00098         else if( q == 0 ) description += ", photons";
00099         else if( q == 1 ) description += ", positrons";
00100         else description += ", unknown particle type";
00101     }
00102 }

00105 
00106 EGS_COLLIMATED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00107         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00108     createSourceTemplate<EGS_CollimatedSource>(input,f,"collimated source");
00109 }
